text: Aea or Aia () or Aeaea or Aiaia () was a town in Malis in ancient Thessaly. It was mentioned by Sophocles.Soph. fr. 829 N It was presumably a harbour town, and its site has not been located. ==References== Category:Populated places in ancient Thessaly Category:Former populated places in Greece Category:Malis (region) Category:Lost ancient cities and towns
title: Aea (Malis)
